thread.title: BRIEF-Adf Group Inc - Announces Award Of Two New Major Projects In United States Worth A Total Of $95 Million

title: BRIEF-Adf Group Inc - Announces Award Of Two New Major Projects In United States Worth A Total Of $95 Million
text:
Market News April 23, 2018 / 1:30 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Adf Group Inc - Announces Award Of Two New Major Projects In United States Worth A Total Of $95 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Adf Group Inc: 
* ADF GROUP INC - ANNOUNCES AWARD OF TWO NEW MAJOR PROJECTS IN UNITED STATES WORTH A TOTAL OF $95 MILLION 
* ADF GROUP - THE NEW ORDERS TO BE CARRIED OUT AT BOTH OF COâ€™S FABRICATION PLANTS AND WILL EXTEND UNTIL Q3 OF FISCAL YEAR ENDING JANUARY 31, 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
